title: Core Expression Files - TypeScript
description: Convert core expression system files from JavaScript to TypeScript. This includes the Parser and Help system.

tasks.description: Convert Parser.js to TypeScript with proper tokenization and parsing types
Convert Help.js to TypeScript with proper documentation types
Convert remaining core expression files: parse.js, compile.js, evaluate.js to TypeScript

acceptanceCriteria: All 5 core expression files converted to TypeScript
Parser tokenization and AST generation properly typed
All parser and expression tests pass
